meanings.sent1: The teacher predesignates the group leaders for the project.
meanings.sent2: She always predesignates the meeting time to avoid confusion.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller predesignates the lucky numbers for the lottery.
meanings.sent4: His intuition predesignates the right path to take in difficult situations.
meanings.sent5: The map predesignates the locations of hidden treasures for the adventurous explorers.

meanings.definition: To specify or indicate in advance.
meanings.sent1: The contract predesignates the payment schedule clearly.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast predesignates a sunny day tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The recipe predesignates the exact measurements for a perfect cake.
meanings.sent4: His behavior predesignates his mood before he even speaks.
meanings.sent5: The signs predesignates the upcoming turns on the road for drivers to follow.
